mapper.select: select * from tbl_request order by req_seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_request (req_seq, req_title, req_content, req_file, req_dt, req_email, req_type) values (TBL_REQUEST_SEQ.nextval, #{req_title}, #{req_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{req_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{req_email}, 'N')
